import React from 'react'; import { ThemeProvider, createTheme } from '@mui/material/styles'; import CssBaseline from '@mui/material/CssBaseline'; import { Box, Typography, AppBar, Toolbar, Grid, Container } from '@mui/material'; import MainInfo from './components/MainInfo'; import FinancialStatements from './components/FinancialStatements'; import BullBearDebate from './components/BullBearDebate'; import ChartSection from './components/ChartSection'; import PeerComparison from './components/PeerComparison'; import { Panel, PanelGroup, PanelResizeHandle } from 'react-resizable-panels'; const theme = createTheme({ palette: { primary: { main: '#0071e3', // Apple blue }, secondary: { main: '#1db954', // Apple green }, background: { default: '#fff', paper: '#f5f5f7', }, text: { primary: '#111', secondary: '#888', }, }, typography: { fontFamily: '"SF Pro Display", "Roboto", "Helvetica", "Arial", sans-serif', h4: { fontWeight: 700, }, h5: { fontWeight: 600, }, }, }); function App() { return ( Apple Dashboard Prototype Main Info Loading...}>
